name: 英語教學議題研究
goals: To deal with various topics of current interest in teaching English as a second/foreign language.
To discusses new approaches to problems facing the field, in both teaching and learning, as well as studies of instructional materials leading to possible solutions.
syllabus:
*   Course Introduction. 
*   Chapter 3: Contextualizing Communicative Approach
*   Chapter 10: Lesson Planning
*   Chapter 11: Techniques, Textbooks, and Materials
*   Chapter 12: Technology in Language Learning and Teaching
*   Chapter 13: Creating an Interactive Classroom
*   Chapter 14: Classroom Management
*   Midterm exam/project presentation  
*   TBA
*   Chapter 15: Teaching Listening 
*   Chapter 16: Teaching Speaking 
*   Chapter 17: Teaching Reading 
*   Chapter 18: Teaching Writing
*   Chapter 19: Teaching Grammar and Vocabulary 
*   Chapters 20: Language Assessment
*   Chapters 21: Classroom-Based Assessment
*   Final exam/project
prerequisite: ◎Available for junior and senior year B.A. program students (Doctoral program courses excepted) and M.A. program students.
